answers.answer: arimidex shuts down the production of estrogen through your adrenal glands, and this lack of estrogen, as that which occurs after menopuse, can thin the tissues of your labia, which in turn can cause inflammation and itching.sometimes, a local low-dose estrogen cream applied SPARINGLY to the area can help.make sure your docs have ruled out any type of infection.also, diabetes can cause perianal itching. make sure your blood glucose and A1C levels have been checked.

question: I have extreme labia and anal itching. I have been to two dr. and it is not yeast and they can't seem to give me any answers.  I had breast cancer 2 years ago and am on Ameridex, can that cause extreme itch?  Help the itch is driving me crazy
title: Help extreme itch
